data.text: @barstoolsports Left wing liberal pc culture.  Ruining everything.  Sucks when it comes back to bite you in the ass.  Paybacks a bitch.  It’s why I say liberalism is a disease.
@BillyTLacey @shaneflannagan @barstoolsports give jim jeffries, ricky gervais, and katt williams latest specials a watch on netflix. painfully funny
@shaneflannagan @barstoolsports Meanwhile Bill Burr refuses to let genuine who gives a fuck comedy die.

@shaneflannagan @barstoolsports My point was if you took both my examples and dropped them today it’s the audience that is dead. They’ve lost sight of humor and politicized it into this that the other. https://t.co/abUjQNLcdX
@barstoolsports I thought the “job” of a comedian was to be funny?
@MattRyanForever @barstoolsports That was an angry mental breakdown it wasn’t comedy
@BillyTLacey @barstoolsports Yea, everything you listed is before 2008 like I said lol. Not a single thing ever funny on SNL or late night shows now. Not a single thing

@shaneflannagan @barstoolsports And comedy is not dead, laughter maybe but not comedy. Everyone should go buy Richard Pryors album “That Ni**ers Crazy” and enjoy someone who turns reality into comedic brilliance n laugh WITH the man. Dave Chappelle’s Racial draft was hilarious-today, racist. So stupid.
@barstoolsports Where was she or The View when Michael Richards needed them?
@shaneflannagan @barstoolsports When did she joke about raping kids?
@barstoolsports Comedians can still be comedians, they just might not be able to be Disney movie directors.
@barstoolsports And by the way "joking" about raping kids, not sure whats so funny about that. Just being honest. But I might be the weird one that finds jokes about raping little kids not funny
@barstoolsports Comedy has been dead since about 2008
@barstoolsports She’s right. Everyone gets offended at every joke in this day n age
